title: E-commerce Backend API Development
description: Built a robust RESTful API for an e-commerce platform, handling user authentication, product management, and order processing. Implemented with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, incorporating secure JWT authentication.

title: Unity Mobile Game Prototype
description: Developed a functional prototype for a casual mobile puzzle game using Unity and C#. Explored game mechanics, UI/UX design, and basic physics simulation, demonstrating core gameplay loops.

title: Real-time Data Visualization Dashboard
description: Created a dynamic web dashboard to visualize real-time sensor data. Utilized React for the frontend, D3.js for interactive charts, and a WebSocket connection for live data feeds.

title: Cloud Infrastructure Automation with Terraform
description: Automated the deployment and management of cloud resources (VPCs, EC2 instances, S3 buckets) on AWS using Terraform. Focused on creating reusable and scalable infrastructure as code modules.

title: Real-time Data Visualization Dashboard
description: Created a dynamic web dashboard to visualize real-time sensor data. Utilized React for the frontend, D3.js for interactive charts, and a WebSocket connection for live data feeds.
